title: René Redzepi Plans to Close Noma, Reopen It as an Urban Farm (Jeff Gordinier/New York Times)
content:
Jeff Gordinier / New York Times:
René Redzepi Plans to Close Noma, Reopen It as an Urban Farm  —  COPENHAGEN — “Welcome to the new Noma,” the chef René Redzepi said on a bright summer day.  “This is it.”  —  Mr. Redzepi, 37, the godfather of the New Nordic movement and the chef at Noma …
